charges.charge_disposition: The defendant is hereby committed to the custody of the United States Bureau of Prisons to be imprisoned for a total term of thirty-one (31) months Count I and II concurrently. The defendant shall surrender for service of sentence at the institution designated by the Bureau of Prisons before 2:00 p.m. on 4/19/99. Upon release from imprisonment, the defendant shall be on supervised release for a term of (1) one year. The defendant shall pay a total fine in the amount of $1, 000.00. Schedule of payments. Statement of reasons. (1)

The defendant is hereby committed to the custody of the United States Bureau of Prisons to be imprisoned for a total term of thirty-one (31) months Count I and II concurrently. The defendant shall surrender for service of sentence at the institution designated by the Bureau of Prisons before 2:00 p.m. on 4/19/99. Upon release from imprisonment, the defendant shall be on supervised release for a term of (1) one year. The defendant shall pay a total fine in the amount of $1, 000.00. Schedule of payments. Statement of reasons. (2)
Remaining counts are dismissed on the motion of the United States. (3-11)
